text:
Chicago or New York - Full time - Android developer

Picturelife is a service that safely and privately backs up and organizes photos and videos from all your devices and social networks.

We are a small group of designers and engineers who love photography, and we are always on the lookout for talented folks.

We are particularly looking for a talented Android developer to help produce an app that matches or exceeds the features and design of our iOS app.

We offer competitive pay and benefits with an outstanding work environment.

Email jobs@picturelife.com.
